recipe.title: Cranberry Gingerbread with Brown Sugar Whipped Cream
ingredients: 3/4 cup (1 1/2 sticks) unsalted butter, room temperature
3/4 cup firmly packed dark brown sugar
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons unsulfured light molasses
2 1/2 cups cranberries, coarsely chopped in processor
instructions: For gingerbread: Preheat ovven to 350°F. Grease 13x9x2-inch galss baking dish; dust with flour. Sift first eight ingredients into medium bowl. Using electric mixer, beat butter in large bowl until light and fluffy. Add sugar and beat until fluffy. Beat in eggs 1 at a time. Beat in molasses. Mix in dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk, beginning and wndying with dry ingredients. Fold in cranberries and crystallized ginger. Spread batter in prepare pan. Bake until springy to touch, about 50 minutes. Cool cake in pan on rack. Serve warm or at room temperature with brown sugar cream and a sprinkling of cinnamon.
